import React from 'react' import { removeProductFromCart } from '../features/cartSlice' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const CardTemplate = ({key, imgsrc, id, productName, productVersion, productPrice}) => { if (!key, imgsrc, productName, productVersion, productPrice) return 'loading' return (
{productName}
{`${productPrice}/- Rs`}
dispatch(removeProductFromCart(id))}/>
) } export default CardTemplate
